name: Mad Crash Racing
description:
Avoid the accident with your beautiful red sport car. Do not drive the wrong way of the road. Tap to change the lane.
How many laps you can go before you crash? Be patient. ;)

Features:

* One tap gameplay
* Great graphics
* 3D sound effects
* Particles
* Easy to play but hard to master racing game
